channel.title: X logging

item.title: X logging
item.dc:creator: @duhelis duhelis
item.description:
@duhelis wrote:

i need help with x logging…
becouse while people is fighting thay can x logout…

heres my logout

public void logout() { killMyNPCs(); if(inPitsGame){ inPitsGame = false; PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1; println_debug(playerName + " resetted pits!"); } resetfollowers(); savegame(true); outStream.createFrame(109); //logoutButton = true; }

Read full topic
